lead_paragraph: An employee at the Orange County Central Men’s Jail was taken into custody on Thursday for aiding the escape of three inmates from the maximum security facility last week.

headline.print_headline: California: Another Arrest in Jail Break
headline.main: California: Another Arrest in Jail Break

snippet: An employee at the Orange County Central Men’s Jail was taken into custody on Thursday for aiding the escape of three inmates from the maximum security facility last week.
abstract: California authorities arrest Nooshafarin Ravaghi, employee at Orange County Central Men's Jail, for helping three inmates escape maximum security facility.
